source: Alaska 211, Alaska Office of Veterans Affairs, Alaska Warrior Partnership

resources.name: Alaska 211
resources.description: Comprehensive resource database with over 1.2 million visits to date. Helps residents locate social services including military and veteran services across Alaska.

resources.name: Alaska Office of Veterans Affairs
resources.address: Department of Military and Veterans Affairs, Juneau, AK
resources.description: State agency serving as primary advocate for Alaska's veterans. Helps veterans file claims for education, medical or other benefits and assists in obtaining earned military awards.

resources.name: Alaska Warrior Partnership (AKWP)
resources.description: Veteran-focused, community-led initiative to proactively connect with all veterans and ensure access to quality resources and opportunities. Uses Community Integration Model for holistic veteran support.

resources.name: Alaska Coalition For Veterans and Military Families
resources.description: Network of organizations throughout Alaska who work together to assess and meet the needs of service members, veterans and their families

resources.name: Alaska Housing Finance Corporation - Veterans Mortgage Program
resources.description: Home financing program for service members and veterans at lower interest rates with little to no down payment required and 1% interest rate reduction

resources.name: Alaska Department of Labor - Veteran Employment Services
resources.description: Provides specialized employment services for veterans including job counseling, job search workshops, resume assistance, and DVOP specialist support

resources.name: Veterans Readiness and Employment (VR&E)
resources.description: Federal program assisting veterans with service-connected disabilities to prepare for, find, and keep suitable jobs through job training and employment accommodations

resources.name: Alaska Veterans and Pioneers Home
resources.description: Provides assisted living for veterans with 75% of 79 beds reserved for veterans. Offers comprehensive care and support services.

resources.name: Anchorage VA Regional Office
resources.description: VA regional office providing comprehensive benefits administration services for Alaska veterans

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 free confidential crisis support for veterans and families experiencing mental health crises, PTSD, suicidal thoughts
